sentences.en: Don't be flippant, damn it! This is serious!
sentences.cn: 该死，不要不当回事！这是很严肃的！

sentences.en: Don't be flippant, damn it! This is serious.
sentences.cn: 别不当回事，该死！这可不是闹着玩儿的事。

sentences.en: He encouraged her to speak her mind , to be flippant and daring.
sentences.cn: 他鼓励她有什么说什么, 随便说,不拘束.

sentences.en: He is content to draw the most flippant of morals from the story.
sentences.cn: 他满足于从故事中引出最轻率的教训.

sentences.en: He now dismisses that as a flippant comment.
sentences.cn: 他现在把那当作轻率的随口一说不再理会了。
她轻佻的语调使他很生气。

sentences.en: In my long answer, I try to be a little less flippant.
sentences.cn: 至于我的长答案, 我尽量不罗唆.

sentences.en: It might seem flippant and cynical but one questions the relevance of the product in itself.
sentences.cn: 我这个问题可能有一些没礼貌和过于随便,不过我对于产品本身有一点疑问.

sentences.en: It was a flippant and unfeeling remark.
John was offended by the doctor flippant attitude.
sentences.cn: 约翰被医生“轻率”的态度而激怒.

sentences.en: John was offended by the doctor's flippant attitude.

sentences.en: The girl is flippant in behavior.

trans.tran_cn: 轻薄的，轻浮的，无礼的，油头滑脑，轻口薄舌
